                                                     java.lang.String redirectUri,

                                                     InstagramConstants.PermissionScopes[] permsRequested)
        Build the instagram Auth URL
        Parameters:
        clientId - Client ID
        redirectUri - Redirect URI
        responseType - return type, pass null to automatically use 'token'
        Returns:
        Full html string to use in a web page

      • wasLoginSuccessful

        public static boolean wasLoginSuccessful(java.lang.String url,
                                         java.lang.String redirectUri)
        Checks if login was successful by checking if they received back an access token
        Parameters:
        url - Response from server (on page finished() call)
        redirectUri - Redirect uri used
        Returns:
        boolean, true if it was successful (token to parse out), false if not.

      • getLoginAccessToken

        public static java.lang.String getLoginAccessToken(java.lang.String url,
                                                   java.lang.String redirectUri)
        Get the access token for instagram from the passed in url (response) and redirectUri
        Parameters:
        url - Response from server (on page finished() call)
        redirectUri - Redirect uri used
        Returns:
        String of access token. Will be null if it could not parse out
